law.text: Eligible recipients may receive financial assistance equal to a maximum of fifty percent (50%) of the cost of the planning activity. Financial assistance provided may be used to employ staff, contract with other units of government or qualified consultants, and pay administrative costs involved in plan preparation. Recipients may meet their share of planning costs by cash and contributed services. Assistance may not be used for any acquisition of land or interest in land, equipment, or waste management system operational activities.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 398, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1984.
